featured.text: The performer’s fingers have to be slightly wet when playing it.
If you touch your finger to a hot stove, you know it’s going to hurt.
Franklin moistened his fingers and held them against the rims of the glass hemispheres as they turned, producing a unique sound.

definition.zh_def: 手指，通常指手的五個延伸部分之一。
definition.en_def: A digit of the hand, typically one of the five extensions of the hand.
definition.example: She pointed at the map with her finger.
